Posts.EditableText:
I recently uploaded version 3 of Sequitur, a parser game in Inform. It is a mystery in which you use a computer program, called Sequitur, to solve a mystery by piecing together video and audio clips gathered from the crime scene. I hope this version gives a better sense of progress and should make the game easier to follow.  The game page is at http://textadventures.co.uk/games/view/0ghes3z0uko0un7fjt6iiw/sequitur

Nigel
